items.name: Apple iPad mini 2 16GB WiFi
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/iPad & Tablets/Tablet PCs
items.shortDescription: With this Apple iPad mini 2 16GB, you have easy access to the high-tech world right in the palm of your hand. This small but powerful device boasts a beautiful retina display that gives you vivid images and high screen quality. This Apple iPad mini 2 WiFi comes with an A7 chip with motion coprocessor. It also has built-in Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) with MIMO support so accessing the internet is simple and easy. It features a FaceTime HD camera so you can reach out to friends and family with video calls whenever you want. This 7.9" tablet is the ideal size for easy storage but with a screen big enough for you to view pictures and videos with ease. It comes with 5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording so you can take pictures and create videos that you will be proud to share. This Apple iPad mini 2 16GB comes complete with iPhoto, iMovie, Garageband, Pages, Numbers and Keynote apps for your convenience.
items.longDescription: <b><br>Apple iPad mini with Retina Display with Wi-Fi Space Gray or Silver:</b><ul><li>7.9" Apple iPad with retina display</li><li>A7 chip with M7 motion coprocessor</li><li>Built-in Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) with MIMO support</li><li>Up to 10 hours of battery life<sup>1</sup></li><li>5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording</li><li>FaceTime HD camera</li><li>iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, Pages, Numbers and Keynote apps included</li><li>Apple iPad mini 2 WiFi 16gb has over 475,000 apps on the App Store<sup>2</sup></li><li>iOS 7 and iCloud</li><li>Cellular data service on Wi-Fi + cellular models (sold separately)</li><li>Available in space gray or silver</li></ul>1 - Battery life varies by use and configuration. See www.apple.com/batteries for more information. <br>2 - Refers to the total number worldwide. Not all content is available in all countries.

items.name: PlayStation 4 UNCHARTED: The Nathan Drake Collection Console Disc Bundle (PS4)
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Video Games/PlayStation 4/PlayStation 4 Consoles
items.longDescription: <p>The Best Place To Play</p><p>The UNCHARTED: The Nathan Drake Collection PS4 Bundle</p><p>Play Through Three Critically Acclaimed Adventures: Discover the epic story that made Drake a legend in the single player campaigns for UNCHARTED: Drake's Fortune, UNCHARTED 2: Among Thieves, and UNCHARTED 3: Drake's Deception, all re-mastered with the power of your PS4 system. <b>Game included as a physical disc in box.</b></p><ul><li>Relive The Legend: Experience one of the most revered game series of all time as you follow the perilous journey of Nathan Drake across the globe, from humble beginnings to extraordinary discoveries. Meet an unforgettable cast of characters as Drake puts life and friendship on the line in a race against ruthless enemies to uncover unimaginable treasure.</li><li>Only On PlayStation 4: Your PS4 system is the one and only place you can experience developer Naughty Dog's groundbreaking UNCHARTED trilogy all in one place.</li><li>Photo Mode - Freeze gameplay at any time and take control of the camera to capture your most memorable moments from the trilogy to share with friends directly from your PS4 system. Utilize graphical filters, camera controls, and other options to customize your shot.</li></ul><p>It's your adventure. The PS4 system opens the door to incredible experiences, all on demand when you want them.</p><ul><li>Play Online With Your Friends, get free games, and exclusive discounts with PlayStation Plus (sold separately).</li><li>Stream Music, Movies, Sports, and Shows on Netflix, Amazon, and more. Subscription fees may apply.</li><li>Enhance Your Games with PlayStation Headsets (sold separately) featuring a custom Audio Modes for select titles.</li></ul><p>GREATNESS AWAITS</p><p>Additional charges can apply for online content. There may be mandatory in-game updates which users must download to continue playing. "PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks and PS4 is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.</p>

items.name: Apple iPod touch 16GB, Assorted Colors
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/Portable Audio/Apple iPods
items.shortDescription: <p>Whether you're an avid gamer looking for a more powerful way to play, a music devotee seeking a better portable music experience, or a hobbyist photographer with an adventurous streak, the Apple 16 GB iPod touch packs a host of awesome features into a sleek package. A stunningly crisp 4-inch Retina display, a powerful A8 chip and M8 motion coprocessor make for a beautifully detailed, highly responsive gaming experience. Connect to Wi-Fi to FaceTime with friends and family, download music and games, send messages to your friends or post to social media. Capture the fun of impromptu gatherings with the iPod's 8-megapixel iSight camera with exposure control and improved HDR and face detection. And of course, the iPod touch is a sleek way to keep your music with you, and access the iTunes Store to grab your next favorite album. Attractive and designed to go with you everywhere, the iPod touch is available in 5 stunning colors to suit anyone's taste.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Apple iPod touch 16GB, Assorted Colors:</b><div style="margin-left: 2em"><b>Key Features:</b></div><ul><li>4-inch Retina display</li><li>A8 with M8 motion coprocessor</li><li>8MP iSight & FaceTime cameras</li><li>1080p HD video recording</li><li>802.11ac Wi-Fi & Bluetooth 4.1</li><li>Up to 40 hours audio playback</li></ul><div style="margin-left: 2em"><b>Legal</b><br>iPod models are not available in all colors at all resellers.<br>Membership required. Requires initial sign-up. At the end of the trial period, the membership will automatically renew and payment method will be charged on a monthly basis until autorenewal is turned off in account settings.<br>FaceTime calling requires a FaceTime-enabled device with a Wi-Fi connection.<br> Display size is measured diagonally.<br>Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles and may eventually need to be replaced. Battery life and number of charge cycles vary by use and settings. See www.apple.com/batteries for more information.<br>TM and (C) 2015 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.</div>

items.name: Xbox One Console Value Bundle with Bonus Controller (Save $85)
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Video Games/Xbox One/Xbox One Consoles
items.shortDescription: <b>Xbox One Console Solution Bundle:</b><ul><li>Choice of Xbox One Console Bundle</li><li>Bonus Controller</li></ul><p>* Items in main image may become unavailable. Only items selected will be received. Click on items for more information.</p>
items.longDescription: <p>Jump ahead with Xbox One.</p><p>Experience the greatest games lineup in Xbox history this year with exclusives like Halo 5: Guardians, Rise of the Tomb Raider, and Forza Motorsport 6. Play with friends on Xbox Live, the world?s premier gaming community. Quickly switch back-and-forth between games, live TV, and apps. Play your Xbox 360 games with the advanced features of Xbox One. And stream your Xbox One games to a Windows 10 PC anywhere in your home.</p><ul class="noindent"><li>Includes:</li></ul><ul><li>500GB Hard Drive</li><li>Wireless Controller</li><li>Chat Headset</li><li>HDMI Cable</li><li>Power Supply</li><li>Wireless networking capability</li></ul><br><br><p>NOTE: Kinect for Xbox One may or may not be included. Click console description and read to ensure you are purchasing your desired product. * Advanced TV hardware required. Initial set-up, updates, and some games and features require broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer requires Xbox Live Gold (sold separately). Streaming functionality available in supported games; stream to one device at a time; streaming with multiplayer from Xbox One requires home network connection and Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately). Xbox One Backward Compatibility feature works with select Xbox 360 games, see http://www.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-one/backward-compatability. Xbox 360 accessories and Kinect, and games requiring those accessories, are not compatible with Xbox One consoles. Xbox Live and broadband internet required for initial download of game to console. Beta preview program has limited functionality and only supports select Xbox 360 digital games. Games sold separately.</p>

items.name: RCA Viking Pro 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet 32GB Quad Core
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/iPad & Tablets/Android Tablets
items.shortDescription: <p>Versatile and powerful, the RCA Viking Pro 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet with detachable keyboard offers an adjustable and multi-faceted user experience to suit a wide range of uses. The 10 Viking Pro operates on Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and showcases the operating system's brand-new, critically-acclaimed visual design. The Viking Pro's amazingly clear, 10.1-inch high definition screen makes for an incredibly vivid and detailed viewing experience, and the impressive 1.3GHz quad-core processor is powerful enough to zip through applications and tasks quickly. Use the detachable keyboard and built-in trackpad to update your social statuses, compose emails and navigate the Web. When it's time to get down to business, open up the included WPS Office app to create compelling documents and spreadsheets. Effortlessly transition the RCA 10 Viking Pro into a stand-alone tablet by detaching the keyboard. Available in Pink, Sky Blue, Purple or Charcoal for a stylish, personal 2-in-1 tablet experience.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>RCA Viking Pro 2-in-1 with WIFi 10.1" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><br><br><ul><li>1.3GHz Quad-Core processor</li><li>1GB DDR of system memory</li><li>10.1" touchscreen, 1280 x 800 resolution</li><li>Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back 2MP webcam and front 1MP webcam</li><li>microUSB 2.0 port, USB 2.0 port, miniHDMI port, headphone jack, microphone jack, DC-in jack</li><li>32GB onboard storage memory, additional memory via microSD card slot</li><li>Up to 6 hours of run time on a full charge</li><li>Weighs 1.15 lbs; 10.2" x 0.39" x 6.5" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Android 5.0 OS (Lollipop)</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery, keyboard and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: Xbox One 500GB Console  - Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Bundle
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Video Games/Xbox One/Xbox One Consoles
items.shortDescription: Pre-order the Xbox One 500GB Gears of War Ultimate Edition Console Bundle, featuring a full-game download of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, the Superstar Cole multiplayer Xbox One Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Bundlelayer skin, and early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta. Experience the advancement of the latest. The Xbox One Gears of War bundle outdoes the original Gears of War and is rebuilt from the ground up in 1080p, including 60FPS competitive multiplayer with 19 maps, six game modes and five campaign chapters never released on the console. This edition is also your ticket to the 4 Beta. The Xbox one 500GB console bundle features the first game at its best, a bundle for veterans of the series and newcomers alike. Bring all the excitement and adventure to your screen as you play against other gamers. The Xbox One 500GB Gears of War Ultimate Edition Console Bundle is a nice addition to a serious player who wants to take their fun to the next level.
items.longDescription: <p><b><br>Xbox One 500GB Gears of War Ultimate Edition Console Bundle:</b><br></p><ul><li>Preorder the Xbox One Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Bundle</li><li>Includes full-game download of the original Gears of War remastered in 1080p</li><li>Play 5 campaign chapters never released on console</li><li>Experience competitive multiplayer in 60FPS with 19 maps and six game modes</li><li>Features the Superstar Cole multiplayer skin</li><li>Get early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta</li><li style="list-style: none">What's in the Xbox One Gears of War Bundle Box<ul><li>500GB console</li><li>Full game download of the original Gears of War remastered in 1080p</li><li>Exclusive superstar Cole multiplayer skin DLC</li><li>Get early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta</li><li>Xbox one wireless controller with 3.5mm stereo headset jack</li><li>HDMI cable</li><li>Power Supply</li></ul><p>* Available at participating retailers, while supplies last. Gears of War: Ultimate Edition game download code inside. Physical game disc is not included. Download from Xbox Live: ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer features require Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately).For early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta when it launches (expected spring 2016), login to Xbox Live and play Gears of War: Ultimate Edition by March 1, 2016. Must be 17+. Xbox One, broadband internet (ISP fees apply) and Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately) required. Beta dates, content, and features subject to change. Not available in all markets. See www.GearsofWar.com for the latest information.</p></li></ul>

items.name: Xbox One White 500GB Gears of War Special Edition Console Bundle - Walmart Exclusive
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Video Games/Xbox One/Xbox One Consoles
items.shortDescription: Be a part of a special gaming experience and take advantage of this Walmart Exclusive by purchasing this Xbox One Gears of War Console Bundle. It includes a variety of features, such as the Cirrus White console and controller, a full-game download of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, the Superstar Cole multiplayer skin and early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta. The 500GB White Xbox One Special Edition Console lets you experience the original Gears of War rebuilt from the ground up in 1080p, including 60FPS competitive multiplayer with 19 maps and six game modes. You also get five campaign chapters that have never been released on console. For a limited time, when you play Gears of War: Ultimate Edition on this gaming console, you will get the entire Xbox 360 Gears of War collection to play on Xbox One. Gears of War: Ultimate Edition is also your ticket to the Gears of War 4 Beta. This is the first Gears at its best and is a bundle for veterans of the series and newcomers alike.
items.longDescription: You will have plenty of fun rolling through all of the features offered on this game, as well as the special missions offered that have never been seen before. You can make all this possible when you buy the Xbox One Gears of War Console Bundle Walmart Exclusive.<b><br>Xbox One White 500GB Gears of War Special Edition Console Bundle, Walmart Exclusive:<br></b><ul><li>Own the Xbox One Special Edition Gears of War Bundle, featuring the Cirrus White console and controller</li><li>Includes full game download of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition in 1080p</li><li>Get the entire Xbox 360 Gears of War collection to play on Xbox One</li><li>500GB White Xbox One Special Edition Console lets you play 5 campaign chapters never released on console</li><li>Experience competitive multiplayer in 60FPS with 19 maps and 6 game modes</li><li>Features the Superstar Cole multiplayer skin</li><li>Get early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta</li></ul><p>*Available at participating retailers, while supplies last. Gears of War: Ultimate Edition game download code inside. Download from Xbox Live: ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer features require Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately). Xbox One Backward Compatibility feature works with select Xbox 360 games, see http://www.xbox.com/xbox-one/backward-compatibility. Xbox 360 accessories and Kinect, and games requiring those accessories, are not compatible with Xbox One consoles. Xbox Live and broadband internet required for initial download of game to console. Includes Xbox 360 titles Gears of War, Gears of War 2, Gears of War 3 and Gears of War: Judgment. Each title will work as part of the Xbox One Backward Compatibility program upon backward compatibility general availability expected fall 2015. To qualify purchase and play Gears of War: Ultimate Edition on Xbox Live between August 25, 2015 and December 31 2015. For early access to the Gears of War 4 Beta when it launches (expected spring 2016) login to Xbox Live and play Gears of War: Ultimate Edition by March 1, 2016. For early beta access and access to the Xbox 360 Gears of War collection, must be 17+; Xbox One, broadband internet (ISP fees apply) and Xbox Live Gold membership (sold separately) required. Dates, content, and features subject to change. Not available in all markets. See www.GearsofWar.com for the latest information.</p>

items.name: SCEPTRE X405BV-F 40" LED Class 1080P HDTV with ultra slim metal brush bezel, 60Hz
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/TV & Video/Shop TVs by Type/LED TVs
items.shortDescription: <p>The Sceptre 40" LED Class Full 1080P HDTV X405BV-F with 60Hz delivers top of the line picture and audio quality at an amazing value. This LED HDTV features a sleek and streamlined look that will lend an air of elegance to any room, with its sophisticated glossy black finish and slim brushed metal bezels. The 1080P LED display is composed with over 2 million pixels, delivering a vast array of vivid colors and rich, clear details, and the amazing automatic contrast enhancement helps balance images to look bolder and more lifelike. A 60Hz refresh rate lets you watch your favorite shows and movies flicker-free for an uninterrupted viewing experience. The Sceptre 40" LED Class also comes equipped with 3 HDMI ports that let you connect game systems and other devices with the convenience of a single cord. Experience home theatre surround sound without moving from your couch by controlling the Scepter sound bar with a click of the included remote control.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Note:</b> You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre 40" LED Class Full 1080P HDTV X405BV-F with 60Hz. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.<p><br><b>SCEPTRE X405BV-F 40" LED Class 1080P HDTV with ultra slim metal brush bezel, 60Hz:</b></p><ul><li>40 inch TV LED panel<br>With a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution</li><li>True 16:9 aspect ratio<br>View your movies as the director intended</li><li>Wide 176-degree vertical and 176-degree horizontal angles<br>See a clear picture from anywhere in the room</li><li>Built-in digital tuner<br>Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available</li><li>Three HDMI inputs<br>Enjoy a superior HD experience with HDMI, the one cable audio/video solution</li><li>40" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner</li><li>Wall mountable<br>VESA standard 400mm x 200mm</li></ul><br><br>Flat screen TV stand sold separately. See all <b><a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/133114" target="_blank">TV stands</a></b>.<br><br>Flat screen TV mount sold separately. See all <b><a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/581514">TV mounts</a></b>.<br><br><b>ENERGY STAR<sup>(R)</sup></b><br>Products that are ENERGY STAR-qualified prevent greenhouse gas emissions by meeting strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency and the U.S. Department of Energy. This 60Hz 32" LED HDTV with ultra-slim metal brush bezel features a features crystal clear display. It emits brighter and more robust colors and has a fast response time for non-ghosting images. The additional feature of a USB port helps further expand the functionality of your television. It allows users to listen to music and view digital pictures quickly and conveniently on this 32" HDTV. It can also be used as a PC monitor for a better viewing experience. This item comes with a built-in digital tuner for catching your favorite broadcast shows. It also has a true 16:9 aspect ratio for watching your movies the way that the director intended.

items.name: RCA 7" Tablet 16GB Quad Core
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/iPad & Tablets/Android Tablets
items.shortDescription: <p>Introducing the RCA 7 Voyager II 7-inch Google Certified Tablet. Operating on Android's sweetest operating system yet, Android 5.0 (Lollipop), you can enjoy more of what the Google Play store has to offer, whether you're into gaming, social apps, music, movies or are looking for the latest productivity app. Share a smile with friends and family using the tablet's front camera. Use the tablet's built-in Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with compatible devices. Whether taking in a movie, playing a favorite game or surfing the Web, the RCA tablet's quad-core processor and 16GB flash-storage provide an excellent portable experience.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>RCA 7 Voyager II with WiFi 7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><br><br><ul><li>1.3GHz Quad-Core processor</li><li>1GB DDR of system memory</li><li>7.0" touchscreen, 1024 x 600 resolution</li><li>Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Front 1MP webcam</li><li>microUSB 2.0 port, headphone jack, microphone jack</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory, additional memory via microSD card slot</li><li>Rechargeable lithium-ion battery</li><li>Weighs 0.61 lbs; 7.3" x 0.5" x 4.5" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Android 5.0 OS (Lollipop)</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: Xbox One 500GB Console with Kinect Bundle
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Video Games/Xbox One/Xbox One Consoles
items.longDescription: Get the family up and moving with the Xbox One with Kinect Bundle, featuring full-game downloads of Dance Central Spotlight, Kinect Sports Rivals, and Zoo Tycoon. Command your Xbox and TV with your voice and play full-body games where you are the controller. Join friends on Xbox Live, the world's premiere gaming community. Use your voice to find your favorite entertainment, snap apps, switch instantly and start recording game clips. Instantly switch between your games, live TV, and apps. Make Skype calls in HD on your TV. Broadcast your gameplay live with picture-in-picture and work out smarter with Xbox Fitness. With new features and enhancements added all the time, and over two hundred since launch, there's more fun for everyone on Xbox One.<ul><li>Get the family up and moving with the Xbox One with Kinect Bundle</li><li>Includes full-game downloads of Dance Central Spotlight, Kinect Sports Rivals, and Zoo Tycoon</li><li>Command your Xbox and TV with your voice.</li><li>Join friends on Xbox Live, the world's premiere gaming community</li><li>Instantly switch between games, live TV, and apps</li><li>Make Skype calls in HD on your TV</li><li>Work out smarter with Xbox Fitness</li><li>Broadcast gameplay live with picture-in-picture</li></ul><p>*Game download codes inside marked packages at participating retailers, while supplies last. Download from Xbox Live; ISP fees apply. Advanced TV hardware required. Initial set-up, updates, and some games and features require broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer requires Xbox Live Gold (sold separately). Xbox Fitness workouts sold separately. Additional workouts included with Xbox Live Gold, see xbox.com/xboxfitness.</p>

items.name: Samsung UN40J5200 40-inch LED HDTV
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/TV & Video/Shop TVs by Type/LED TVs
items.shortDescription: The Samsung J5200 Series 40" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV improves your entertainment time. It makes all your favorite shows, movies, games and media content come to life. The 1080p smart HDTV provides twice the resolution of standard HDTV. Enjoy an intuitive, connected home entertainment experience with this device. Get a clear moving picture resolution at motion rate 60 with amazing refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology. The 16:9 aspect ratio allows you to see every image as the director intended with enriched colors, even with older, non-HD content. With this 40" smart TV, you can access your favorite program choices, live TV, video on demand, apps and social media. It comes in one easy-to-browse navigation experience. The built-in Wi-Fi will enhance your family's TV viewing experience by effortlessly connecting with more content.
items.longDescription: <p>Practical features include two HDMI inputs and the ability to mount it on the wall. The built-in tuner makes it easy to watch digital broadcasts when available. Note: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Samsung 40" HDTV. items.name: RCA Cambio 10.1" 2-in-1 Tablet 32GB Intel Quad Core Windows 10
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/iPad & Tablets/Windows Tablets/All Windows Tablets
items.shortDescription: Introducing the RCA Cambio 10.1-inch high-resolution Windows tablet with detachable keyboard. Powered by an Intel processor, the RCA Cambio is ready to tackle any task. Preloaded with Windows 10, the RCA Cambio boasts a clean and easy-to-use user interface. Create powerful documents and slideshows with Microsoft Office mobile apps including Word mobile, PowerPoint mobile and Excel Mobile. Store your files on the ample built-in 32GB flash memory or use the microSD card slot which supports up to 64GB of additional storage. Use the Cambio's Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with nearby compatible devices. Connect with the world and setup a videoconference using the Cambio's front 1MP or rear 2MP cameras.
items.longDescription: <br><b>RCA Cambio W101 V2 2-in-1 with WiFi 10.1" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><ul><li>Intel Z3735 processor</li><li>2GB DDR of system memory</li><li>10.1" touchscreen, 1280 x 800 resolution</li><li>Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back 2MP webcam and front 1MP webcam</li><li>microUSB 2.0 port, USB 2.0 port, miniHDMI port, headphone jack, microphone jack, DC-in jack</li><li>32GB onboard storage memory, additional memory via microSD card slot</li><li>Up to 6 hours of run time on a full charge</li><li>Weighs 1.15 lbs; 10.2" x 0.39" x 6.5" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Windows 10 OS<<li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery, keyboard and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

This LED smart HDTV has two HDMI input ports to enhance the high-def experience. With up to a 1366 x 768 resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio you can see images edge-to-edge and you won't miss a thing. This Samsung 32" 720p LED HDTV lets you easily navigate to find your favorite show, movies, sports and games using the Smart Hub feature. It has built-in WiFi so you can stream videos and other content directly from the internet. The Samsung 32" 720p 60Hz LED HDTV, UN32J4500AFXZA, includes a base or can be wall-mounted if you prefer.

items.name: Sceptre X505BV-F 50" 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/TV & Video/Shop TVs by Type/LED TVs
items.shortDescription: <p>The stylish, glossy black Sceptre X505BV-F 50" LED 1080P HDTV with 60Hz offers a truly customizable viewing experience. This LED HDTV features a sleek and streamlined look that will lend an air of elegance to any room, with a sophisticated glossy black finish and swiveling screen. The 1080P LED display is composed of over 2 million pixels, delivering a vast array of vivid colors and rich, clear details, and the amazing automatic contrast enhancement helps balance images to look bolder and more lifelike. A 60Hz refresh rate lets you watch your favorite shows and movies flicker-free for an uninterrupted viewing experience. The Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) transfers all of your thrilling multimedia entertainment (including movies, TV and music) from your MHL-enabled smart phone or tablet onto your TV screen. The Sceptre 50" HDTV also comes equipped with 3 HDMI ports that let you connect game systems and other devices with the convenience of a single cord.</p>

Packed with 1080p resolution, an almost endless variety of vibrant colors and sharply bold images practically leap from the 55-inch display. With three HDMI ports, enjoy connecting three of your favorite devices to this LED HDTV at once. The second HDMI port is equipped with Mobile HD Link technology, which can connect any MHL-enabled smartphone or tablet to the TV. All the actions performed on the MHL-enabled device will be mirrored on the screen. Now, not only can you watch, but you can also interact by exploring all of your apps on a 55-inch screen! Roku Ready is also built into this MHL port, so yet another avenue of exhilarating entertainment is at your fingertips.<br><br><b>Note:</b> You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre 55" LED HDTV. items.name: Apple iPad Air 32GB WiFi
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/iPad & Tablets/Tablet PCs
items.shortDescription: For work, school or personal use, the Apple iPad Air 32GB WiFi is a wise choice. It features the A7 chip with M7 motion co-processor and 64-bit architecture, which lets you multitask and enjoy even the most demanding applications. The iOS 8 environment ensures smooth, user-friendly interface and navigation, while WiFi 802.11a/b/g/n provides ultrafast wireless access to the Internet. This iPad Air with retina display includes features such as 5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording, a FaceTime HD camera as well as iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, iCloud and more. You also get access to over 475,000 apps on the App Store (refers to the total number worldwide, not all content is available in all countries). The Apple iPad Air Tablet is 20 percent thinner when compared with iPad (4th generation) and weighs just one pound, so it feels unbelievably light in your hand.
items.longDescription: With up to 10 hours of battery life you will be able to take with you on the go. Choose either space gray or silver.<br><b>Apple iPad Air 32GB WiFi:</b><br><ul><li>9.7" retina display</li><li>A7 chip with M7 motion co-processor</li><li>Apple iPad Air Tablet has built-in Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) with MIMO support</li><li>Offers up to 10 hours of battery life (battery life varies by use and configuration. See www.apple.com/batteries for more information)</li><li>5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording</li><li>FaceTime HD camera</li><li>iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, Pages, Numbers, and Keynote apps included</li><li>Over 475,000 apps on the App Store (refers to the total number worldwide, not all content is available in all countries)</li><li>iOS 8 and iCloud</li><li>Cellular data service on Wi-Fi + Cellular models (sold separately)</li><li>Available in space gray or silver</li><li>iPad Air with retina display is 20% thinner (compared with 4th generation iPad)</li></ul>

items.name: Beats Studio Over-Ear Headphones - Assorted Colors
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/Portable Audio/MP3 Accessories/Headphones
items.shortDescription: The Beats Studio Over-Ear Headphones, Assorted Colors, offer the sound quality you are looking for. The popular headset has been completely redesigned and re-imagined. The new Beats studio headphones are even lighter, stronger and more comfortable. They sound better than ever with precision sound, adaptive noise canceling and remote talk. The rechargeable headphones feature a 20-hour rechargeable battery, so you can listen virtually uninterrupted all day. They come is your choice of eight colors, allowing you to put some of your personality into them. They include a charging cable, a power adapter, an audio cable, a remote talk cord, a hard shell carrying case and a Beats cleaning cloth. They have all the energy and excitement you expect from Beats, plus a powerful re-engineered sound.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Beats Studio Over-Ear Headphones:</b><ul><li>Over-ear headphones</li><li>Beats studio headphones adaptive noise canceling</li><li>20-hour rechargeable battery</li><li>RemoteTalk</li><li>Includes USB 2.0 charging cable, power adapter, 3.5mm audio cable, RemoteTalk cable, hard shell carrying case and Beats cleaning cloth</li><li>Colors available: blue, red, pink, metallic sky, titanium, white, black, matte black</li></ul>

items.name: Samsung UN50J5200AFXZA 50" 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
items.categoryPath: Home Page/Electronics/TV & Video/Shop TVs by Type/LED TVs
items.shortDescription: <p>Samsung's J5200 Series 50" 1080p Smart LED HDTV makes all your favorite TV, movies, games and media content come to life in stunning Full HD 1080p with twice the resolution of standard HD TV. Enjoy an intuitive, connected home entertainment experience with Smart TV and Wi-Fi built in. Enjoy a crisp, clear moving picture resolution at Motion Rate 60 with amazing refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology. See every image as the director intended with enriched colors -- even with older, non-HD content. With Smart TV, you can access your favorite program choices, live TV, video on demand, apps and social media in one easy-to-browse navigation experience. Easily browse the Web right on your TV -- enjoy everything from online shopping and social media to entertainment news. An eco sensor feature intelligently adapts the screen's brightness to help efficiently manage energy use.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Samsung UN50J5200AFXZA 50" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV:</b><br><br><br><ul><li>Smart 1080p LED HDTV</li><li>1920 x 1080 resolution</li><li>Smart Hub and DLNA features</li><li>WiFi</li><li>Share media from various compatible devices</li><li>2X clearer than standard HD TVs</li><li>Wide color enhancer</li><li>Eco Sensor adjusts brightness to the room</li></ul>

items.shortDescription: <p>Introducing the RCA 7 Voyager II 7-inch Google Certified Tablet. Share a smile with friends and family using the tablet's front camera. Use the tablet's built-in Bluetooth capability to connect and pair with compatible devices. Whether taking in a movie, playing a favorite game or surfing the Web, the RCA tablet's quad-core processor and 16GB flash-storage provide an excellent portable experience.</p>

Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer.
